item.description:
Practice Portuguese while listening to traditional Brazilian Samba music at the Sunset Cafe (a Portuguese Restaurant).

For those who prefer a quieter setting, I reccommend this event for it takes place at a restaurant, not a loud bar. It is simply a restaurant that offers live music on a Friday night.

You may order a full dinner or just drinks. The place is comfortable and the food is good.

Receita de Samba typically plays at the Sunset Cafe every Saturday, starting at 8pm.
So do you not have to wait for a Meet-Up to enjoy their music.

To listen to a music sample and see their event calendar: go to Receita de Samba's website at www.myspace.com, search for "Receita de Samba"

*** Please try to confirm with a "YES" as much in advance as possible so I better make a more acurate table reservation. ****
item.how_to_find_us: There will be a "Portuguese Meet-up" sign at the table

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Brazilian Samba Music at the Sunset Cafe
